com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.helpers

Class SCUIPresentationDataConversionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.helpers.SCUIPresentationDataConversionHelper

  • public class SCUIPresentationDataConversionHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility helper class which handles conversion of data into a format which is required by the presentation layer.
    Example Usage: This utility is used by the framework, when the XAPI output XML is converted into JSON format. ISCUIPresentationDataConvertor SCUIJSONUtils statikonda

    • Method Detail

      • registerConvertor

        public static void registerConvertor(java.lang.String name,
                                     ISCUIPresentationDataConvertor convertor,
                                     int priority,
                                     javax.servlet.ServletContext context)
        Utility method to register a convertor for a name.
        Usage: Name can be the attribute name in case of XAPI to JSON conversion name The identifier for which the convertor has to be registered convertor The actual convertor implementation priority The priority with which the convertor needs to be registered. Priority value should be one of the following:
        • SCUIPresentationDataConversionManager.FIRST
        • SCUIPresentationDataConversionManager.INTERMEDIATE
        • SCUIPresentationDataConversionManager.LAST
        context The servlet context

      • getDisplayValue

        public static java.lang.String getDisplayValue(java.lang.String name,
                                               java.lang.String value,
                                               SCUIContext context)
        Utility method which returns the converted value which needs to be displayed on the UI. name The name with which the convertors have been registered value The current value to be converted context The current UI context The converted value, or the original value if no convertors have been registered

      • hasConvertorRegistered

        public static boolean hasConvertorRegistered(java.lang.String name,
                                             SCUIContext context)
        Utility method to check if a convertor is registered for this name. name context true if a convertor is registered for this name else false

      • registerElementConvertor

        public static void registerElementConvertor(java.lang.String xpath,
                                            ISCUIDataConvertor<org.w3c.dom.Element> convertor,
                                            int priority,
                                            SCUIContext uiContext)
        Utility method to register a convertor for an element node. xpath The xpath for the node convertor The actual convertor implementation priority The priority with which the convertor needs to be registered. Priority value should be one of the following:
        • SCUIDataConversionManager.FIRST
        • SCUIDataConversionManager.INTERMEDIATE
        • SCUIDataConversionManager.LAST
        uiContext The UI Context
